Hello World!

Shannon believes that curiosity and creativity go hand-in-hand and approaches every situation with an open mind.

Today, Shannon is a recent UX intern and a third year student at Algonquin College studying graphic design. She has been a freelance artist for over ten years and is profecient in several mediums including acrylic, watercolour, charcoal, graphite, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects and Photoshop. Follow, subscribe and enjoy!
